text: Filotas Pellios (; born 22 March 1953) is a retired Greek footballer. He is president of the PAOK veterans association. ==Honours== ;PAOK *Greek Cup: 1974 *Greek Championship: 1976 == References == ==External links== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Thessaloniki Category:Greek footballers Category:PAOK FC players Category:Greece international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:PAOK FC non-playing staff
title: Filotas Pellios
